titleStmt.title: The young-mans A.B.C. Or, Two dozen of verses which a young-man sent his love, who proved unkind. The tune is, The young-mans A.B.C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by and for A. Milbourn, and sold by the booksellers of Pye-corner and London-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
